title: NFRA’s Maize Price Cut: Smart Market Move or Blow to Small Farmers? - Malawi Nyasa Times - News from Malawi about Malawi

title: Who Watches the Watchers? Why Malawi Needs Judicial Accountability Without Fear
summary:
Every modern democracy accepts one basic truth: power must be matched with accountability. Without it, authority mutates into arrogance, and public institutions drift from service into self-protection.

That is why Malawians deliberately created the Independent Complaints Commission (ICC) to oversee...

Every modern democracy accepts one basic truth: power must be matched with accountability. Without it, authority mutates into arrogance, and public institutions drift from service into self-protection.

That is why Malawians deliberately created the Independent Complaints Commission (ICC) to oversee the police. Not because we hate the police, but because history has taught us that coercive power w...

text_preview:
PressCane’s ethanol plant in Chikwawa

* To turn sludge waste in its evaporation dam into compost manure as it is in the process of being decommissioned

* The 26 hectares of land of the evaporation ponds on will be progressively rehabilitated and partially repurposed for tree planting, including selected fruit trees that surrounding communities will directly benefit from

title: ‘Parents should raise children without burdening them with lifelong debt’ – Maravi Express – Your Kind of News. Clear and accurate.
summary:

text_preview:
* Says an advisory note offered to parents who may consciously or unconsciously believe that their children ‘owe’ them for being raised, educated, clothed and protected
